de.affect.gui

Class AffectMonitorFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • de.affect.gui.AffectMonitorFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AffectMonitor, EmotionMaintainerNotifier, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class AffectMonitorFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements AffectMonitor, EmotionMaintainerNotifier
    The AffectMonitorFrame displays all characters' affective status. Information are given about the current mood and emotions respectively its actual intensity.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Patrick Gebhard
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
